user_question: Can you find the main programming languages used for developing mobile apps and generate a sample code snippet for a simple app in one of them?
final_answer: The main programming languages for mobile app development include Swift, Java, Kotlin, and Objective-C. A sample code snippet for a simple app in Swift has been generated.
